file_insights.changes_made: Added TikTok Shop API configuration section with three new environment-based configuration variables

patterns_discovered.description: All configuration values use os.getenv() with fallback defaults, consistent with existing Anthropic API configuration approach
New TikTok Shop configuration section is logically grouped together with clear comments, following existing pattern of Anthropic API configuration section above it
Sensitive credentials (APP_KEY, APP_SECRET) default to empty strings, while non-sensitive endpoint URLs have hardcoded production defaults

gotchas_discovered.description: TIKTOK_SHOP_APP_KEY and TIKTOK_SHOP_APP_SECRET default to empty strings. No runtime validation exists to ensure these required credentials are actually provided before API calls are attempted
gotchas_discovered.potential_impact: Silent failures or authentication errors at runtime if environment variables are not set

gotchas_discovered.description: The API base URL has a hardcoded default value, which assumes the production endpoint is always the desired target
gotchas_discovered.potential_impact: May need to switch URLs for staging/development environments, requiring code changes rather than environment variable updates

gotchas_discovered.gotcha: No error handling for missing credentials
gotchas_discovered.description: Configuration is loaded but no immediate check validates that required TikTok Shop credentials are present
gotchas_discovered.potential_impact: Errors will only surface when the API is actually called, making debugging harder

approach_outcome.description: Successfully added TikTok Shop API configuration to config.py on first attempt. Configuration follows established patterns in the codebase and is properly structured with environment variable sourcing and sensible defaults.

recommendations.recommendation: Add validation logic to ensure TIKTOK_SHOP_APP_KEY and TIKTOK_SHOP_APP_SECRET are not empty strings at application startup. Consider raising an error or warning if required credentials are missing
recommendations.implementation_suggestion: Add a validation function in config.py or a startup check that validates all required API credentials

recommendations.recommendation: Consider making TIKTOK_SHOP_API_BASE_URL more flexible for different environments by allowing environment override or supporting multiple environment configurations (dev/staging/prod)
recommendations.implementation_suggestion: Keep the current default but document that it can be overridden via environment variable

recommendations.recommendation: Document the required environment variables (TIKTOK_SHOP_APP_KEY, TIKTOK_SHOP_APP_SECRET) in a .env.example file or README with setup instructions
recommendations.implementation_suggestion: Create or update environment variable documentation to include new TikTok Shop credentials

recommendations.recommendation: Consider adding TikTok Shop configuration to any existing configuration validation or logging mechanisms that handle other API credentials
recommendations.implementation_suggestion: Review if there's a configuration audit/logging system that should include the new TikTok Shop settings
